action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Spotify API integration. The playlist endpoint consistently returns 404 errors for all tested playlist IDs. This could be due to: 1) Regional restrictions on auto-generated playlists, 2) API permissions issues, 3) Need to test with user-created public playlists instead of Spotify's auto-generated ones. Consider testing with a manually created public playlist or investigating Spotify API documentation for playlist access requirements.
